price: 10. Tokkel usun sinni Rabbih farmoyta cineenih, wonnaluk Yalli gibdi mabbuxuh ken yibbixe (digaalá kinnuk).
arabic: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣaw rasūla rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rābiyatan
